legends.title: The First Thorn
legends.summary: A splinter from the seduction in Eden, now a living briar that drinks corruption and memory alike.
hooks: Elves bleed to keep it tame
Witches want it drowned in brine
A Confessor dreams of burning it at dawn

legends.title: The Broken Stair
legends.summary: Dreamers climb a staircase of ash and salt; every step remembers a sin; the door at the top won’t open.
hooks: Reclaimers claim the key is geometry, not repentance
A dwarf says the door is a seal and the seal is a mercy

legends.title: Foundry Heart
legends.summary: The Soul Crucible sings a name in the night. Those who speak it are never seen again, except as sparks in the smoke.
hooks: A rune-mother hides a ledger of the lost

legends.title: Crescent in the Sand
legends.summary: A shard fell like a star and taught the dunes to move. It obeys only the branded and the bereft.
hooks: The Emir’s blade points where the wind already leans
A slave child draws maps in sleep—of cities not yet buried

legends.title: The Ogre Who Would Be King
legends.summary: He wears a crown of rivets and wire because no one told him kings bleed too.
hooks: Some say he remembers a mother; some say he remembers a machine
He speaks with the voice of stairs and storms
